A. F. Kay.desc: Passive. Skip your first two turns. Start with two minions from Tier 3.
A. F. Kay.name: A. F. Kay

Al'Akir.desc: Passive. Start of Combat: Give your left-most minion Windfury, Divine Shield, and Taunt.
Al'Akir.name: Al'Akir

Alexstrasza.desc: Passive. After you upgrade the Tavern to Tier 5, Discover two Dragons of any Tier.
Alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza

Ambassador Faelin.desc: Passive. Skip your first turn. Discover a Tier 2, 4, and 6 minion to get at those Tiers.
Ambassador Faelin.name: Ambassador Faelin

Aranna Starseeker.desc: Passive. After 14 friendly minions attack, the first minion you buy each turn is free. (14 left!)
Aranna Starseeker.name: Aranna Starseeker

Arch-Villain Rafaam.desc: Next combat, get a plain copy of the first minion you kill.
Arch-Villain Rafaam.name: Arch-Villain Rafaam

Bru'kan.desc: Choose an Element. Start of Combat: Call upon that Element.
Bru'kan.name: Bru'kan

C'Thun.desc: At end of turn, give a friendly minion +1/+1. Repeat 0 times. (Upgrades each turn!)
C'Thun.name: C'Thun

Cap'n Hoggarr.desc: Passive. After you buy a Pirate, gain 1 Gold.
Cap'n Hoggarr.name: Cap'n Hoggarr

Captain Eudora.desc: Dig for a Golden minion! (5 Digs left.)
Captain Eudora.name: Captain Eudora

Captain Hooktusk.desc: Remove a friendly minion. Choose one of two from a Tier lower to keep.
Captain Hooktusk.name: Captain Hooktusk

Cariel Roame.desc: Give 2 friendly minions +1/+1. (After you upgrade the Tavern, choose an improvement!)
Cariel Roame.name: Cariel Roame

Chenvaala.desc: After you play 3 Elementals, reduce the Cost of upgrading the Tavern by (3).
Chenvaala.name: Chenvaala

Cookie the Cook.desc: Throw a minion in your pot. When you've gathered 3, Discover from their types. (3 left!)
Cookie the Cook.name: Cookie the Cook

Dancin' Deryl.desc: Passive. When you buy a minion, give it a +1/+1 hat that passes to a friendly minion when sold.
Dancin' Deryl.name: Dancin' Deryl

Deathwing.desc: Start of Combat: Give ALL minions +2 Attack permanently.
Deathwing.name: Deathwing

Dinotamer Brann.desc: Passive. After you buy 5 Battlecry minions, get 'Brann Bronzebeard'. (Once per game.)
Dinotamer Brann.name: Dinotamer Brann

Drek'Thar.desc: Avenge (2): Give your minions +1 Attack permanently.
Drek'Thar.name: Drek'Thar

Edwin VanCleef.desc: Give a minion +1/+1. Upgrades after you buy 4 minions. (4 left!)
Edwin VanCleef.name: Edwin VanCleef

Elise Starseeker.desc: Discover a minion from your Tier. Costs (1) more after each use.
Elise Starseeker.name: Elise Starseeker

Enhance-o Mechano.desc: Passive. After each Refresh, give a minion in the Tavern Taunt, Windfury, Reborn, or Divine Shield.
Enhance-o Mechano.name: Enhance-o Mechano

Forest Warden Omu.desc: Passive After you upgrade the Tavern, gain 2 Gold.
Forest Warden Omu.name: Forest Warden Omu

Fungalmancer Flurgl.desc: Passive. After you sell 5 minions, get a random Murloc. (5 left!)
Fungalmancer Flurgl.name: Fungalmancer Flurgl

Galakrond.desc: Choose a minion in the Tavern. Discover a higher Tier minion to replace it.
Galakrond.name: Galakrond

Galewing.desc: Choose a new flightpath. Complete it to get a bonus!
Galewing.name: Galewing

Greybough.desc: Passive Give +1/+2 and Taunt to minions you summon during combat.
Greybough.name: Greybough

Guff Runetotem.desc: Give a friendly minion of each Tier +2/+2.
Guff Runetotem.name: Guff Runetotem

Heistbaron Togwaggle.desc: Steal all minions from the Tavern. Each turn, your next Hero Power costs (1) less.
Heistbaron Togwaggle.name: Heistbaron Togwaggle

Illidan Stormrage.desc: Passive. Start of Combat: Your left and right-most minions gain +2/+1 and attack immediately.
Illidan Stormrage.name: Illidan Stormrage

Infinite Toki.desc: Refresh the Tavern. Include two minions from a Tier higher than yours.
Infinite Toki.name: Infinite Toki

Inge, the Iron Hymn.desc: Give a minion Attack equal to your Tier. (Swaps to Health next turn!)
Inge, the Iron Hymn.name: Inge, the Iron Hymn

Ini Stormcoil.desc: Passive. After 10 friendly minions die, get a random Mech.
Ini Stormcoil.name: Ini Stormcoil

Jandice Barov.desc: Swap a friendly non-Golden minion with a random one in the Tavern.
Jandice Barov.name: Jandice Barov

Kael'thas Sunstrider.desc: Passive. Every third minion you play gains +2/+2.
Kael'thas Sunstrider.name: Kael'thas Sunstrider

King Mukla.desc: Passive At the start of your turn, get 2 Bananas and give everyone else one.
King Mukla.name: King Mukla

Kurtrus Ashfallen.desc: Passive. Once per turn, after you buy 3 minions, get a plain copy of one of them. (3 left!)
Kurtrus Ashfallen.name: Kurtrus Ashfallen

Lich Baz'hial.desc: Steal a minion from the Tavern. Take damage equal to its Tier.
Lich Baz'hial.name: Lich Baz'hial

Maiev Shadowsong.desc: Make a minion in the Tavern Dormant. After 3 turns, get it with +2/+2.
Maiev Shadowsong.name: Maiev Shadowsong

Malygos.desc: Replace a minion with a random one of the same Tier. (Twice per turn.)
Malygos.name: Malygos

Master Nguyen.desc: Passive. At the start of every turn, choose from 2 new Hero Powers.
Master Nguyen.name: Master Nguyen

Millhouse Manastorm.desc: Passive. Minions and Refreshes cost 2 Gold. Upgrading the Tavern costs (1) more.
Millhouse Manastorm.name: Millhouse Manastorm

Millificent Manastorm.desc: Passive. Whenever you summon a Mech, give it +2 Attack.
Millificent Manastorm.name: Millificent Manastorm

Mr. Bigglesworth.desc: Passive. After another hero dies, Discover a minion from their warband. It keeps enchantments.
Mr. Bigglesworth.name: Mr. Bigglesworth

Murloc Holmes.desc: Look at 2 minions. Guess which one your next opponent had last combat for a Coin.
Murloc Holmes.name: Murloc Holmes

Mutanus the Devourer.desc: Remove a friendly minion. Spit its stats onto another. Gain 1 Gold.
Mutanus the Devourer.name: Mutanus the Devourer

N'Zoth.desc: Passive. Start the game with a 2/2 Fish that gains all your Deathrattles in combat.
N'Zoth.name: N'Zoth

Nozdormu.desc: Passive. Your first Refresh each turn costs (0).
Nozdormu.name: Nozdormu

Onyxia.desc: Passive. Avenge (3): Summon a 3/1 Whelp. It attacks immediately.
Onyxia.name: Onyxia

Overlord Saurfang.desc: Give a minion in the Tavern +2/1+. (Doubles every 3 turns!)
Overlord Saurfang.name: Overlord Saurfang

Ozumat.desc: Passive. Start of Combat: Summon a 2/2 Tentacle with Taunt. (Gains +1/+1 after you sell a minion!)
Ozumat.name: Ozumat

Patches the Pirate.desc: Get a Pirate. After you buy a Pirate, your next Hero Power costs (1) less.
Patches the Pirate.name: Patches the Pirate

Patchwerk.desc: Passive. Start with 60 Health instead of 30.
Patchwerk.name: Patchwerk

Professor Putricide.desc: Craft a custom Undead. (3 Creations left!)
Professor Putricide.name: Professor Putricide

Pyramad.desc: Give a minion +1 Health. (Gains +1 Health each turn you don't use this!)
Pyramad.name: Pyramad

Queen Azshara.desc: Passive. When your warband reaches 25 total Attack, begin your Naga Conquest.
Queen Azshara.name: Queen Azshara

Queen Wagtoggle.desc: Passive. Start of Combat: Give a friendly minion of each type stats equal to its Tier.
Queen Wagtoggle.name: Queen Wagtoggle

Ragnaros the Firelord.desc: Passive. After you kill 25 enemy minions, get Sulfuras. (25 left!)
Ragnaros the Firelord.name: Ragnaros the Firelord

Rakanishu.desc: Give a minion stats equal to your Tier.
Rakanishu.name: Rakanishu

Reno Jackson.desc: Make a friendly minion Golden. (Once per game.)
Reno Jackson.name: Reno Jackson

Rock Master Voone.desc: Passive. At the end of every 3 turns, get a plain copy of the left-most card in your hand. (3 turns left!)
Rock Master Voone.name: Rock Master Voone

Rokara.desc: Passive. After a friendly minion kills an enemy, give it +1 Attack permanently.
Rokara.name: Rokara

Scabbs Cutterbutter.desc: Discover a plain copy of a minion from your next opponent's warband.
Scabbs Cutterbutter.name: Scabbs Cutterbutter

Silas Darkmoon.desc: Passive. Darkmoon Tickets are in the Tavern! Get 3 to Discover a minion of your Tier.
Silas Darkmoon.name: Silas Darkmoon

Sindragosa.desc: Freeze a minion in the Tavern. Passive: At the end of your turn, Frozen minions get +2/+1.
Sindragosa.name: Sindragosa

Sir Finley Mrrgglton.desc: Passive. At the start of the game, Discover a Hero Power.
Sir Finley Mrrgglton.name: Sir Finley Mrrgglton

Sire Denathrius.desc: Passive. At the start of the game, choose one of two Quests.
Sire Denathrius.name: Sire Denathrius

Skycap'n Kragg.desc: Gain 1 Gold. Increases each turn. (Once per game.)
Skycap'n Kragg.name: Skycap'n Kragg

Sneed.desc: Give a minion "Deathrattle: Summon a random minion from a Tier lower."
Sneed.name: Sneed

Sylvanas Windrunner.desc: Give +2/+1 to your minions that died last combat.
Sylvanas Windrunner.name: Sylvanas Windrunner

Tamsin Roame.desc: Start of Combat: Destroy your lowest Health minion. Give its stats to your other minions.
Tamsin Roame.name: Tamsin Roame

Tavish Stormpike.desc: Take aim! Start of Combat: Deal 2 damage to your target. (Doubles every 3 turns!)
Tavish Stormpike.name: Tavish Stormpike

Teron Gorefiend.desc: Choose a friendly minion. Start of Combat: Destroy it. When you have space, resummon an exact copy.
Teron Gorefiend.name: Teron Gorefiend

Tess Greymane.desc: Refresh the Tavern with plain copies of your last opponent's warband.
Tess Greymane.name: Tess Greymane

The Curator.desc: Passive. Start the game with a 2/2 Amalgam with Venomous and all minion types.
The Curator.name: The Curator

The Great Akazamzarak.desc: Discover a Secret. Put it into the battlefield.
The Great Akazamzarak.name: The Great Akazamzarak

The Jailer.desc: Give a minion +1/+1. Upgrades after nine friendly minions die. (9 left!)
The Jailer.name: The Jailer

The Lich King.desc: Give a minion Reborn until next turn.
The Lich King.name: The Lich King

The Rat King.desc: Discover a minion of a specific minion type. Swaps type each turn.
The Rat King.name: The Rat King

Thorim, Stormlord.desc: Passive. At the start of the game, Discover a Tier 7 minion to get after you spend 65 Gold. (65 left!)
Thorim, Stormlord.name: Thorim, Stormlord

Tickatus.desc: Passive Every 4 turns, Discover a Darkmoon Prize. (3 turns left!)
Tickatus.name: Tickatus

Trade Prince Gallywix.desc: Passive. After you sell a minion, gain 1 Gold next turn.

Vanndar Stormpike.desc: Passive. Avenge (2): Give your minions +1 Health permanently.
Vanndar Stormpike.name: Vanndar Stormpike

Varden Dawngrasp.desc: Passive. After the Tavern is Refreshed, copy its highest Tier minion and Freeze them both.
Varden Dawngrasp.name: Varden Dawngrasp

Vol'jin.desc: Choose two minions. Swap their stats.
Vol'jin.name: Vol'jin

Xyrella.desc: Choose a minion in the Tavern. Set its stats to 2 and add it to your hand.
Xyrella.name: Xyrella

Y'Shaarj.desc: Start of Combat: Summon and get a minion of your Tier.
Y'Shaarj.name: Y'Shaarj

Yogg-Saron, Hope's End.desc: Steal a random minion from the Tavern. Give it +1/+1.
Yogg-Saron, Hope's End.name: Yogg-Saron, Hope's End

Ysera.desc: Passive The Tavern offers an extra Dragon whenever it is Refreshed.
Ysera.name: Ysera

Zephrys, the Great.desc: If you have two copies of a minion, find the third. (3 Wishes left!)
Zephrys, the Great.name: Zephrys, the Great
